title: Tweetbot  7.1 for iOS adds background notifications, refreshed icons, more
content:
Tweetbot’s developer Tapbot just released version 7.1 of its popular Twitter client for iOS users. This update comes a few weeks after a major version was unveiled by the company.

more…

The post Tweetbot 7.1 for iOS adds background notifications, refreshed icons, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Tweetbot's developer Tapbot just released version 7.1 of its popular Twitter client for iOS users with background notifications and more.
